casebody.data:
CROWN ENTERPRISES, INC., Dibdetroit LLC, Riverview-Trenton Railroad Company, Central Transport LLC, and Detroit International Bridge Company, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
STATE of Michigan, Governor, Department of Transportation, and Michigan Strategic Fund, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 157971
COA: 340039 Supreme Court of Michigan. December 21, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the May 8, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.
